vb7:2.3: nhāru → nahāru (bj, pts-vp-pli1); nahārū (cck); nhārū (sya1ed, sya2ed) | aṭṭhimiñjaṃ → aṭṭhimiñjā (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
vb7:5.5: upāgato samupāgato → apagato samupagato (bj) | sampanno → samuppanno (bj, pts-vp-pli1); samupapanno (sya-all)
vb7:12.2: vedayamāno → vediyamāno (bj, pts-vp-pli1) | vedayāmī”ti → vediyāmīti (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
